data.title: An Insider’s Account of the Yahoo-Alibaba Deal
data.meta_description: Yahoo’s former president talks about how it started and what they’ve learned.
data.text:
SD

Sue Decker, a former president of Yahoo and a former entrepreneur-in-residence at Harvard Business School, is a member of the boards of directors of Berkshire Hathaway, Intel, and Costco Wholesale.
